channel.title: Merch Much
channel.description:
Discuss. [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2ptaqfd.jpg[/img]
Oh btw this was a 5 minute merch. 90k in 5 minutes? Sounds nice and its f2p.
Merch at your own risk.
I am going to host a clan chat on one of my accounts. If your interested in on it pm me your runescape username as I will rank you so you can join. (Yes I want it private)
How to get a higher rank... 1) Be active
Recruit - Basic Rank Corporal - Activity Based Sergeant - Activity Based + 5 Mill (Must have 5 mill) Lieutenant - Activity Based + 10 Mill Captain - Activity Based + 25 Mill General - Activity Based
Please note this is not a merch clan. It is just a clan chat to talk about merching and possible merch ideas.
What do you get out of it? Every week I will toss out 3 items of my own research. My item suggestions are entirely suggestions and you merch at your own risk.

item.title: Merch Much
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

Cole1497:

One more question for MITB/any other staff member. If I were to scam someone, but not mention it at all on this site, could I still get in trouble on here?

Yeah because you’re still a scammer and even if you have the moral not to do it to a fellow MoparScapian, you’re still a scammer.

We’ve all scammed one upon a time, minor or major, so it’s in all of our blood.

Mass ban?

Read full topic

item.title: Merch Much
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:127, topic:381514”][quote author=k0 twin link=topic=477326.msg3503172#msg3503172 date=1297913198]

I know this isn’t relevant, but does anyone know why the hell barrows helms cost so much? With dharoks the legs are 1m and the helm is 7m. wth?

cuz thers no trade limit

Even before free trade dh helm was around 6m. I’m just curious why the helms cost the most in each set.
[/quote]

Helm is the rarest DH item and without the helm the whole set special is fucked. One vital piece makes the difference.[/quote]
Oh, I didn’t know the helms were actually rarer. That explains it, thanks.

Read full topic
